name: The Last Star (spoonbill)
description:
The Last Star
Feb 2022 Godot Wild Jam submission

In this point & click adventure game, you play as Ananta, a wormhole lab tech.  The lab's mission is to find other life in the universe, in the hopes of saving their planet.

For some strange reason, all the stars in the universe are dying, including their own home star.

Open a wormhole to find other life in the universe, and discover the truth of your star.
